attributes.action: Lobby FIFA to change the venue of 2010 World Cup due to South Africa's inaction to resolve Zimbabwe crisis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Key to changing the situation in Zimbabwe lies mainly with South Africa. Hint of decision to change venue of  World Cup would put pressure on S.A. government to take a more positive stance  
and stir them into action as did threat to John Vorster which encouraged his condemnation of Ian Smith.
